name: Big World BETA
description:
In 'Big World' you are navigating the world as a small player who is faced with an objective of collecting coins. You have to find ways to get the coins with your height being extremely small.

I worked on this project as a way for me to practice level design for my Games Design university degree. 

How is this played? - Keyboard & Mouse

Controls:

  • WASD - General Movement
  • Mouse - Look around
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Spacebar in combination with directional key (A, D) - Wall Run
  • Spacebar + Q - Dash
  • Spacebar Twice - Double Jump
  • LMB (Left Mouse Button) - Interact
  • F - Attack

Must Know:

This project is based on level design so not everything will look aesthetically pleasing art wise. I've used this project as a way to practice level design and know that a lot of other functions to aid the design have not been implemented but are part of a 'to-do' list.

Feedback/Constructive Criticism
